Class ModeratorController

java.lang.Object
com.example.full_connection.Controller.ModeratorController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/moderator") public class ModeratorController extends Object
Controller for managing moderator-related operations. This class provides endpoints for moderators to interact with the system. Endpoints: - Manage user reports and content moderation. - Retrieve and update moderator-specific data. Dependencies: - ModeratorService for business logic.
